In England, in the seven days to 24 December, there were 711,470 new confirmed cases (1,258.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 December, there were 491,482 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 45% (219,988 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 December is 10,683,026 (18,891.2 cases per 100,000 population).
